name: Espresso
recipe: Brew 2 oz of espresso using an espresso machine.

name: Americano
recipe: Brew 2 oz of espresso and add 6 oz of hot water.

name: Latte
recipe: Brew 1 shot of espresso. Add 8 oz of steamed milk and top with 1 cm of foamed milk.

name: Cappuccino
recipe: Brew 1 shot of espresso. Add 4 oz of steamed milk and top with 4 oz of foamed milk.

name: Macchiato
recipe: Brew 1 shot of espresso. Add 1-2 teaspoons of foamed milk on top.

name: Mocha
recipe: Brew 1 shot of espresso. Add 1 oz of chocolate syrup, 8 oz of steamed milk, and top with whipped cream.

name: Flat White
recipe: Brew 1 shot of espresso. Add 6 oz of steamed milk with a thin layer of microfoam.

name: Affogato
recipe: Brew 1 shot of espresso and pour it over 1 scoop of vanilla ice cream.

name: Irish Coffee
recipe: Brew 1 shot of espresso. Add 1 tbsp of brown sugar and 1 oz of Irish whiskey. Top with lightly whipped heavy cream.

name: Cortado
recipe: Brew 1 shot of espresso and add 1 shot of steamed milk.

name: Ristretto
recipe: Brew 1 oz of espresso using a fine grind and less water.

name: Lungo
recipe: Brew 2 oz of espresso using a coarser grind and more water.

name: Red Eye
recipe: Brew 1 shot of espresso and add it to 6 oz of drip coffee.

name: Black Coffee
recipe: Brew 2 tbsp of ground coffee with 8 oz of hot water.
